column6: Bio

Living on unceded Wurundjeri land. Born on land belonging to the Cherokee. Naarm (Melbourne) is all I need. Retired enterprise architect, whatever that was. Cyclist (gravel preferred). Capitalism will kill us all. Interested in semiotics, whatever that is. Atheist. Social Democrat. Labor voter. ENTP. Love science. Stream MUBI. Observing the end of the Anthropocene with interest. Tends to be excessively analytical. The unexamined life is not worth living. Everything is political. Everything.
